10 Mar 2011

How Do You Crunch it?

By in category

Today FoodShare is having it’s ‘Great Big Crunch’ event where students and teachers are invited to learn about healthy eating and local and global food systems.

Those of us who support good food and the work of organizations like Foodshare were invited to crunch along with school kids and teachers and snap photos of ourselves digging in.

Here are the folks at Hypenotic striking a pose and doing our part for a healthy food system, the environment,  our health, our local economy and for our bellies.

Barry Likes it Kinda Rough

Agata Crunches for Good Karma

“Someone, Peel me an Apple” says Jodi

Sonja, pretending to be our favorite woodland creature

Sonya does it, just like Eve did it. With sex appeal

All Rick Needs is a spit and he’s ready to roast

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
